subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Li Na, 29, and Francesca Schiavone, 30, make up the oldest French Open final pairing since 1986, when Chris Evert beat Martina Navratilova.
snippet: Li Na, 29, and Francesca Schiavone, 30, make up the oldest French Open final pairing since 1986, when Chris Evert beat Martina Navratilova.
